result.execSummary:
The defendant Tyson Phillip Allan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tyson Phillip Allan is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Tyson Phillip Allan was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Tyson Phillip Allan was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court dismisses Count 3.
Defendant to report to Probation today December 15, 2014 by 4:00 p.m.
Defendant may petition the Court after successful completion of Probation for expungement.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
Court approves payment plan.
Defendant to meet with the payment clerk.

-Defendant to comply with any program recommendations by Agent.
-Substance Abuse Assessment.
-Defendant to work on obtaining GED or HSED.
-Defendant to actively seek work.

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Webb,ADA:  Matthew L. Hartung, DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab   DF:  Tyson Phillip Allan appeared.  Court called at 9:55 a.m. Includes case 14CF42 & 14CF297 (Dismissed). At the Plea Hearing the DE plead Guilty to amended Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor Bail Jumping) and Ct. 2. in 14CF42.  Crt found the DE guilty of amended Ct 1 (Misdemeanor Bail Jumping)  & Ct. 2 in 14CF42.  On motion of the State, Crt dismisses 14CF297. Court ordered a COMPAS Evalutation for the DE with Mr. O'Keefe.  Attorney's make statements and sentencing aruguments.  Crt orders:

S/W 1 year probation with conditions
- Any program recommended by probation
- Substance abuse assessment
- DE to work on obtaining GED or HSED
- DE to actively seek work
- DE can apply for expungement after completing probation
- Court costs $486 and DNA Surcharges of $400 
- Court approves payment plan and to meet with payment clerk
- DE to report to probation today by 4:30 p.m.
- 20 days to appeal
For Compass Evaluation signed by HWC with cover letter. cc: Atty Schwab, ADA Hartung, Mike O' Keefe.
filed by ADA Matthew Hartung. eif
signed by Def. & Atty this date. eif
Sentencing hearing on December 15, 2014 at 09:45 am.

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Webb.  ADA:  Matthew L. Hartung   DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab   DF:  Tyson Phillip Allan appeared.  Court called at 9:41 a.m.  Includes case 14CF42 & 14CF297.  State files Amended Information.  DE files Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights Form.  DE pleads Guilty to amended Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor Bail Jumping) and Ct. 2. in 14CF42.  Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly makes plea. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended Ct 1 (Misdemeanor Bail Jumping)  & Ct. 2 in 14CF42.  Court questions attorneys regarding the DE's prior criminal history.  ADA Hartung makes argument.  On motion of the State, Crt dismisses 14CF297. Court orders a COMPAS Evalutation for the DE with Mr. O'Keefe.  Continue sentencing on.  12/15/14. Court adjourned at 9:56 a.m.  lw

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Webb. ADA: Amber L. Hahn, DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab, DF: Tyson Phillip Allan appeared.  Court called at 10:08 a.m.  Includes case 13CF219, 14CF42 & an arraignment for 14CF297.  Court makes the following finding on the motion for 13CF219 and 14CF42.  Court concludes that there was not probable cause for the search.  Court grants the motion.  
Arraignment for 14CF297.  The Court informs DE of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands.  DE pleads N/G in 14CF297.  Court will set 13CF219, 14CF42 & 14CF297 for a PTC.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 6, 2014 at 09:00 am.

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Webb. ADA: Kevin H. Gehler, DF ATTY: Donald J. Schwab, DF: Tyson Phillip Allan appeared.  Court called at 4:22.  Includes 14CF297, 14CF42 & 13CF219.  Attorney Schwab has filed Motion to Suppress Evidence.  ADA Hahn makes argument.  Attorney Schwab makes argument.  S/T by Officer Aaron Anderson of the New Richmond Police Department.  Direct by ADA Hahn.  DE identified by Officer Anderson.  Cross by Attorney Schwab.  Redirect by ADA Hahn.  Cross by Attorney Schwab. Redirect by ADA Hahn.  Arguments by ADA Hahn.  Arguments by Attorney Schwab.  ADA Hahn requests to do research on case law to support arguements.  ADA Hahn written arguments by 08/29/14.  Attorney Schwab 09/12/14 response.  ADA Hahn 09/19/14 response.  Attorney Schwab Brief on Standing due 09/26/14.  Bond continues in form in amount.  Adjourned at 5:10 p.m. lw  Oral ruling scheduled for October 3, 2014 at 10:00 am.  Review scheduled for September 29, 2014 at 07:55 am.
Status conference on July 22, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Scobey, ADA:  Amber L Hahn   DF ATTY:  Donald J Schwab   DF:  Tyson Phillip Allan appeared. Includes 13CF219 and 14CF42. Set for pre-trial. Cases called at 3:33 p.m. Atty Schwab states in 13CF219 motions will be filed and requests motion hearing. ADA Hahn makes statement as to standing. Crt sets for motion hearing.  Bond continues in form and amount. 14CF42 to trail. Motion hearing scheduled for July 22, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 5, 2014 at 03:30 pm.

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Scobey, ADA:  Amber L Hahn   DF ATTY:  Donald J Schwab   DF:  Tyson Phillip Allan did not appear. Includes arraignment in 14CF42 and pre-trial in 13CF219. Cases called at 2:36 p.m. ATty Schwab is not sure why DE is not in court. ADA Hahn requests warrant. Adjourned 2:38 p.m. Case recalled 2:40 p.m. DE now appears. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights in 14CF42. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Not guilty plea. Atty Schwab may be filing motions and will address at 6-5-14 hearing. Crt sets for pre-trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 5, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
Filed by ADA Hahn. km
